Package com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor.rules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MQSCCodeScanner
    This is a BufferedRuleBasedScanner which attaches the right scanners to the right types of partitions and enables colored text.
    MQSCObsoleteScanners  
    MQSCPartitionRule
    This defines the rules necessary to break an MQSC document into partitions that hold individual MQSC comands.
    MQSCStatefulRule
    This is the rule that uses state information on the text it had arleady seen to ensure that the current bits of text are valid.
    MQSCToken
    This extends the Token class to add minimimal support for MQSCCommandEvents
